channel.title: Item Disconection Problem
channel.description: If I have a rune defender,rune kite shield, or dragon sq, (and many other shields im guessing) and I atk a monster/or if it attacks me the client will freeze and I'll disconnect. Anyone know how to fix this or know whats wrong? I doubt the items arnt recognized since i found the ints in class8 for the rune defender..thanks for any help!

item.title: Item Disconection Problem
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

If I have a rune defender,rune kite shield, or dragon sq, (and many other shields im guessing) and I atk a monster/or if it attacks me the client will freeze and I’ll disconnect. Anyone know how to fix this or know whats wrong? I doubt the items arnt recognized since i found the ints in class8 for the rune defender…thanks for any help!
